response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $750,000. This offer represents a significant discount compared to its true worth, aiming to make it more accessible to someone who appreciates its qualities as much as I do. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product. I am eager to discuss its potential impact on your endeavors.", "product_price": 750000}
